data.title: International Finance Centre, Hong Kong
meta_keywords: 國際金融中心商場ifc mall
國際金融中心商場ifc mall shop list
data.meta_description: ifc at Central Waterfront is a world-class business and leisure destination in Hong Kong. Be sure to come experience the extraordinary!
data.text:
Simply follow the car park signs to One ifc car park on Harbour View Street and Two ifc car park on Finance Street.

Mon - Sun and public holidays:

(Effective from 1 Jan 2018)

HK$ 28 per hour (07:01 - 23:00)

HK$ 15 per hour (23:01 - 07:00 the next day)

Shoppers can now take advantage of exclusive Valet parking or Complimentary parking services.

LEARN MORE

Situated right atop Hong Kong MTR station, the ifc complex is located well enough to allow quick access to the MTR Tung Chung Line as well as the high speed Airport Express.

Hong Kong MTR station also connects to Central MTR station, the interchange for the Island Line and Tsuen Wan Line.

ifc is accessible by the Airport Express or the MTR train at Hong Kong Station Exit F or E1.
